category.name: Test for mixture of such that and pattern

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Modifies(a,"c") pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifies c and uses a?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Uses(a,"a") pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifeis c and followed by other statements?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Follows(a,_) pattern a("c",_);

id.comment: Which is the assignment that modifeis c and nested in a container?

query.querystr: assign a; select a such that Parent(_,a) pattern a("c",_);
